title: i hate fruits
lyrics:
[엔시티 드림 "i hate fruits" 가사]
[Chorus: Jeno, 
Mark
]
You know, I hate fruits but your smile too sweet
I get that feeling, 맘속에서, 설렘 berry, taste, taste, taste
Tryna hate you, 빠져버렸어 너에게
Girl, I need a doctor, 과일 make me break, break, break
[Verse 1: Jisung, 
Jaemin
]
내가 나를 찾으러, 도망 왔어 여기로
근데 널 만난 건 계획된 일이 아니야
하늘에 물병처럼 널 안 볼 수 없었어
사라지지 않기로 해, oh, I can't sleep tonight
[Pre-Chorus: Haechan, 
Chenle
]
비틀비틀 거리네 맘은 so dizzy (Dizzy)
너를 찾은 후 들이켜, better breathing (Breathing)
달달해졌어, oh, 푸른 동화 낙원
Sugar, take me high, 
데려가 줘
, I'm dreaming
[Chorus: All]
You know, I hate fruits but your smile too sweet
I get that feeling, 맘속에서, 설렘 berry, taste, taste, taste
Tryna hate you, 빠져버렸어 너에게
Girl, I need a doctor, 과일 make me break, break, break

[Post-Chorus: Mark, 
Haechan
, 
Chenle
]
Ah, ooh
Love is super sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet in my mouth
Ah, ooh
과일이 싫어, lo-lo-love you so bad
[Verse 2: Mark, 
Chenle
]
Yeah, every night, every night, feel like I'm a kid again
미끄럼, 미끄럼틀 탄 듯이, heart gon' scream
안아주는 저 파도에
낮잠을 잘까 all day
[Pre-Chorus: Renjun, 
Haechan
]
I can never go back, no 꿈을 난 미행 (미행)
새로 밟게 된 scape 속에, better breathing (Breathing)
달달해졌어, oh, 푸른 동화 낙원
Sugar, take me high, 데려가 줘 still dreaming
[Chorus: All]
You know, I hate fruits but your smile too sweet
I get that feeling, 맘속에서, 설렘 berry, taste, taste, taste
Tryna hate you, 빠져버렸어 너에게
Girl, I need a doctor, 과일 make me break, break, break
[Post-Chorus: Jisung, 
Renjun
, 
Jeno
]
Ah, ooh
Love is super sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet in my mouth
Ah, ooh
과일이 싫어, lo-lo-love you so bad

[Bridge: Jisung, 
Jaemin
, 
Renjun
, 
Chenle
]
태양 빛이 나를 삼켜
떠오른 겁도 저물어
You, me, here feel euphoria
처음인 듯 나도 깨어나
Ooh, 
눈앞이 가려진 채 갈 길 잃었을 때
You came and grabbed my hand
Ooh, 한눈에 널 담아, whole world mine, you're mine
[Chorus: All, 
Chenle
]
I'll never hate you 'cause your smile too sweet
I get that feeling, 맘속에서 (
Feeling, 맘속에서
)
설렘 berry, taste, taste, taste (
Yeah
)
Like a grapefruit, 섞어 sweet and sour, pretty girl
날 미치게 해 (
Sweet and sour, oh, girl
)
과일 make me break, break, break
[Post-Chorus: Jisung, 
Mark
, 
Haechan
]
Ah, ooh (
Yeah
)
Love is super sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet in my mouth (
Love is sweet, super sweet in my mouth
)
Ah, ooh
과일이 싫어, lo-lo-love you so bad
 (
Love you so bad, nah
)
